- Jeff and Troy discussed implementation focusing on improving accuracy and adoption
- Agreed to start with higher-volume clients and require AI chat for specific cases
- Jeff emphasized need for reliable system before mandating use
- Troy suggested combining AI chat with scoring tool for better results

**AI Scoring and Training Issues:**
- Identified that AI was incorrectly penalizing conversations for incomplete sentences
- Kristen reported improvements to instructions for creating messages
- Occasional errors still require human review before saving
- Need for better context in training data

**Client Call Scoring Challenges:**
- Discussed scoring issues with difficult clients
- Need for more specific information to avoid confusion
- Kristen suggested simplifying criteria to yes/no answers for consistency
- Focus on improving welcome scripts and questioning techniques
